description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jigsaw Jumble is back with 15 more puzzles in this special Christmas themed edition. Play cooperatively with a friend and solve the puzzles together or play alone for a greater challenge. Features 3 difficulty modes for each puzzle and the ability to resume a puzzle at a later date. With Christmas music included and custom track support.

With Christmas music included and custom track support.
